churchInfo.name: Iglesia de la Santa Faz
churchInfo.address: Pl. Luis Foglietti, 7, 03559 Santa Faz, Alicante, Spain
additionalInfo: Please plan to arrive early to ensure seating.
Kindly refrain from using your phone during the service.
The service will be conducted in both Spanish and Polish.
Dry flower petals will be provided for after the service. Please note that rice is not allowed.
Transport to the wedding venue will be organized after the ceremony.

weddingVenue.name: Finca Casa Luna
additionalInfo: There is a small parking lot right next to the wedding venue that can accommodate a few cars. However, you can easily park nearby within a 5-minute walk.
For any questions, please contact the best man or maid of honour.
weddingVenue.parkingInfo: Small parking lot available, additional parking within 5-minute walk.
